DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness VeraCept Low Dose Intrauterine Copper Contraceptive compare standard T shape copper IUD , TCu380 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study VeraCept Low-Dose Intrauterine Copper Contraceptive vs. TCu380 Copper IUD
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , subject-blinded , two arm control study Safety , Feasibility Effectiveness VeraCept low-dose intrauterine copper contraceptive compare concurrently control , commercially available standard copper `` T '' IUD ( TCu380 ) .
DOC.criteria: Adult female age 18 42 ( premenopausal ) Have least one child ( parous ) currently seek long act reversible contraception Normal uterine cavity determine ultrasound Willing sign inform consent Able willing comply study assessment schedule Post menopausal Pregnant ( time enrollment ) Known anatomical abnormality uterus , cervix and/or fallopian tube Diagnosed treatment cancer Untreated acute cervicitis In treatment active Pelvic Inflammatory Disease Unexplained uterine bleeding menometrorrhagia Known allergy copper ( Wilson 's Disease ) image contrast medium Unsuitable study participation opinion Principal Investigator
